hero.title: Your banking experience, simplified and secure
hero.subtitle: Discover the freedom to manage your finances through our innovative banking services. Whether you need a personal or joint account, we provide the tools you need to control your money.

featuresIntro.title: Discover our innovative banking features
featuresIntro.description: Enjoy a smooth banking experience with our user-friendly application. Manage your personal and joint accounts easily, tailored to your needs.

personalAccounts.title: Personal accounts for your individual needs
personalAccounts.description: Enjoy full control over your finances.

jointAccounts.title: Joint accounts for your shared financial goals
jointAccounts.description: Collaborate with others while managing your common funds.

restrictions.title: Flexible restrictions for account management
restrictions.description: Set custom permissions for joint account holders.

ctaBlock.title: Unlock your full banking potential with us
ctaBlock.description: Enjoy seamless banking at your fingertips. Our online services provide convenience, security, and flexibility for all your financial needs.
points: Stay safe with our advanced security features.

solutions.title: Discover our complete banking solutions tailored to your needs

flexible.title: Flexible account options, personal and joint
flexible.description: Experience smooth banking with our simple personal and joint accounts.

security.title: Secure transactions with advanced encryption
security.description: Your security is our priority, ensuring safe and protected operations.

support.title: 24/7 customer support
support.description: Our dedicated team is available anytime to help you.

join.title: Join us for financial freedom
join.description: Create your account today and explore a banking universe tailored to your needs.

subscribe.title: Subscribe
subscribe.description: Join our newsletter to receive the latest news and exclusive offers.
subscribe.consent: By subscribing, you accept our privacy policy and agree to receive updates.
